name: Super Loop Racer
description:
A Synthwave infinite racer where the only person to beat... is yourself!

Be sucked into an icy retro world and, after defeating the last poor soul to be trapped there, race against your previous laps.

It's recommended to be chill... you don't need to accelerate all the time!

Features:
- Some sort of challenge!
- Graphics!
- Sound!
- Shonky controls!
